data.name: Amarantus
data.detailed_description:
Amarantus is a messy relationship visual novel about trainwrecks, trysts & treason.



I can't keep living in this haze—everything waiting for something that's never going to happen until I make it happen.

It's going to kill me.

Arik's decided it's time somebody does something about the tyrant running the country into the ground. Accompanied by old friends and new strangers, he's off on a roadtrip to court to take the Lord down.

Along the way, he'll make trainwreck decisions, uncover the country's political history, and determine the best plan of attack—and most importantly: navigate a string of disastrous roadtrip relationships.


Keep everyone happy—or pick favourites and alienate others.
The members of your party have distinct outlooks, wants, and needs. Keeping some of them happy might mean betraying others. Walk a fine line to keep everyone happy, or pick favourites and drive others away. With multiple playthroughs required to uncover the true story, you'll have space to experiment.


Develop Arik's motivations and personality through your decisions.
Soft and gentle lad with a heart of gold, or angry and aggressive timebomb? Each decision opens up new relationships with party members—and closes other doors for good.


Cultivate platonic, antagonistic, or romantic relationships—and more.
Each member of your party has different potential relationships for Arik to pursue—or he can step aside and watch them make their own terrible decisions. But be cautious: not every relationship will go well. You might find yourself setting up two party members...then demanding they break up.

Features

  • Four unique characters to befriend, betray, woo or wingman
  • The potential for romantic, platonic, sexual, antagonistic, and polyamorous relationships with different party members
  • 3-4 hours for a single playthrough, multiple playthroughs required to uncover the truth
  • Unlockable graphic inserts by award-winning comic artist Hien Pham
  • Dynamic and immersive sound design underscored by original post-rock soundtrack

data.short_description: A visual novel about trainwrecks, trysts & treason. Roadtrip across the country to take down a tyrant. Befriend, torment, woo or wingman your party members. Decide who you want to be. And maybe, just maybe: make it out of this one alive.
data.reviews:
“A visual novel with all the sexy-times you might expect, but with an atypical art style and a focus on stuff going wrong...I really like the darker tone to this.”
John Walker, Kotaku
